comments: Dr, Maland is a fabulous professor all around. He has a true passion for teaching, and his enthusiasm for film will rub off on you. He\'s very happy to help students in any way, and his grading techniques on papers and tests are very fair. Just make sure to keep up on the readings and lecture notes. If you get the chance, take one of his classes!
everything in that class was either feminist or minority studies. not a good class for white males
Nicest professor ever - very helpful and easy to talk with. Very knowledgeable. I recommend!
A bit goofy; perfect in a tag-team course with Bill Larsen
I also had Dr. Maland for my Film in American Culture in the late 80\'s and TO THIS DAY, he stands as one of the best profs ever. QUite the tastemaker as well without being a total film snob. A+++++

I was in several of Chuck\'s classes back in the \'80s. His knowledge in the area of film studies was boundless, as was his enthusiasm. He was also very adaptable to those with genuine interest. He allowed me to take a graduate level course while I was still a junior. Recently up for a Pulitzer!
He is a nice guy, but you can only take so much of his wierd sense of humor and wild mood swings. Once he said "hi" to me from his bike. I guess he\'s okay. Just kind of ego-dystonic.
